description: The price of Symphony i15 is BDT 5,990. Symphony i15 smartphone comes with a 5.45 inch Full-Screen display with a resolution of 720 x 1440 pixels, 18:9 ratio (~282 ppi density) and performing 1.3 GHz Quad-core processor. It has 1 GB of RAM and 8 GB internal storage, which can be expanded to 32 GB with external storage. This stylish device has an 8 MP in the back and a 5 MP camera on the front side. It was powered by a standard 3200 mAh Li-po battery.
